description:
Kagome is lured to a cave by a voice calling for help. Kagome enters the cave and meets Kikyo. Kikyo doesn`t have enough souls of the dead and has become weakened.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Doukutsu ni wa Kikyou to Kagome no Futari Dake
Kikyo and Kagome, Alone in the Cave
Kikyou e Kagome sozinhas numa caverna
洞窟には桔梗とかごめの二人だけ
